name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, parmesan cheese, black pepper
description: Cook spaghetti until al dente, fry pancetta until crispy, mix eggs and cheese, then combine all with hot pasta.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: chicken breast, soy sauce, bell peppers, broccoli, rice
description: Sauté chicken in a wok, add vegetables and soy sauce, stir-fry until tender, serve over cooked rice.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
ingredients: dark chocolate, butter, sugar, eggs, flour
description: Melt chocolate and butter, mix with eggs, sugar, and flour, bake in ramekins until the edges are set but the center is gooey.

name: Vegetable Soup
ingredients: carrots, celery, onion, tomatoes, vegetable broth
description: Chop vegetables, sauté onions, add broth and remaining veggies, simmer until tender.

name: Beef Lasagna
ingredients: lasagna noodles, ground beef, ricotta cheese, mozzarella, tomato sauce
description: Cook beef with sauce, layer noodles with meat, ricotta, and mozzarella, bake until bubbly and golden.

name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: chicken, butter, cream, tomato puree, garam masala
description: Marinate chicken, cook with spices, simmer in a creamy tomato sauce with butter until tender.

name: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil
description: Roll out dough, spread sauce, add cheese and basil, bake at high heat until crust is crispy.

name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: ground beef, taco shells, lettuce, cheese, salsa
description: Brown beef with spices, warm taco shells, assemble with toppings.

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: basmati rice, chicken, yogurt, saffron, biryani masala
description: Marinate chicken, partially cook rice, layer with spices and chicken, steam until fully cooked.

name: Banana Bread
ingredients: bananas, flour, sugar, eggs, butter
description: Mash bananas, mix with wet and dry ingredients, bake in a loaf pan until golden.

name: Paneer Tikka
ingredients: paneer, yogurt, bell peppers, tandoori masala, lemon
description: Marinate paneer and veggies in spiced yogurt, skewer and grill until charred.

name: French Onion Soup
ingredients: onions, beef broth, bread, gruyere cheese
description: Caramelize onions, add broth, simmer, top with bread and cheese, broil until melted.

name: Dal Tadka
ingredients: yellow lentils, tomatoes, garlic, cumin seeds, ghee
description: Boil lentils, prepare a tempering with ghee and spices, mix into lentils.

name: Pancakes
ingredients: flour, milk, eggs, sugar, butter
description: Mix batter, pour onto a hot griddle, flip when bubbles form, cook until golden.

name: Aloo Gobi
ingredients: potatoes, cauliflower, tomatoes, turmeric, cumin
description: Sauté spices, add potatoes and cauliflower, cook with tomatoes until tender.

name: Tiramisu
ingredients: mascarpone, coffee, ladyfingers, cocoa powder, sugar
description: Dip ladyfingers in coffee, layer with mascarpone cream, chill and dust with cocoa.

name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan, caesar dressing
description: Toss lettuce with dressing, top with croutons and shaved parmesan.

name: Roast Lamb
ingredients: lamb leg, rosemary, garlic, olive oil, potatoes
description: Rub lamb with herbs and oil, roast with potatoes until tender and juicy.

name: Chana Masala
ingredients: chickpeas, tomatoes, onion, garam masala, ginger
description: Cook chickpeas with a spiced tomato-onion gravy until flavors meld.

name: Croissants
ingredients: flour, butter, yeast, sugar, milk
description: Layer dough with butter, roll and fold multiple times, shape, bake until flaky.

name: Egg Fried Rice
ingredients: rice, eggs, soy sauce, peas, green onions
description: Scramble eggs, stir-fry with rice, veggies, and soy sauce.

name: Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: shrimp, garlic, butter, lemon, pasta
description: Sauté shrimp with garlic and butter, add lemon, serve over pasta.

name: Naan Bread
ingredients: flour, yeast, yogurt, garlic, ghee
description: Knead dough, let rise, roll out, cook on a hot skillet until puffed.

name: Guacamole
ingredients: avocados, tomatoes, onion, lime, cilantro
description: Mash avocados, mix with chopped veggies and lime juice.

name: Beef Wellington
ingredients: beef tenderloin, puff pastry, mushrooms, pate, shallots
description: Sear beef, wrap with mushroom duxelles and pastry, bake until golden.

name: Palak Paneer
ingredients: spinach, paneer, cream, garlic, cumin
description: Blanch spinach, blend into a puree, cook with spices and paneer.

name: Omelette
ingredients: eggs, milk, cheese, ham, peppers
description: Beat eggs, pour into a pan, add fillings, fold and cook until set.

name: Baked Ziti
ingredients: ziti pasta, marinara sauce, ricotta, mozzarella
description: Cook pasta, mix with sauce and cheese, bake until bubbly.

name: Macarons
ingredients: almond flour, sugar, egg whites, food coloring
description: Whip egg whites, fold in almond mixture, pipe and bake until crisp.

name: Fish Tacos
ingredients: white fish, tortillas, cabbage, lime, salsa
description: Fry fish, assemble in tortillas with cabbage and salsa.

name: Rogan Josh
ingredients: lamb, yogurt, tomatoes, cardamom, Kashmiri chili
description: Marinate lamb, slow-cook with spices and yogurt until tender.

name: Cheesecake
ingredients: cream cheese, graham crackers, sugar, eggs, vanilla
description: Press crust, mix filling, bake in a water bath, chill before serving.

name: Spring Rolls
ingredients: rice paper, shrimp, carrots, cucumber, mint
description: Soak rice paper, fill with ingredients, roll tightly.

name: BBQ Ribs
ingredients: pork ribs, bbq sauce, brown sugar, garlic
description: Rub ribs with spices, slow-roast, brush with sauce and finish grilling.

name: Samosas
ingredients: flour, potatoes, peas, lentils, spices
description: Make dough, fill with spiced potato mixture, fold and fry until crispy.

name: Quiche Lorraine
ingredients: pie crust, eggs, bacon, cream, cheese
description: Pre-bake crust, mix eggs and cream, add bacon and cheese, bake until set.

name: Churros
ingredients: flour, water, sugar, cinnamon, oil
description: Make dough, pipe into hot oil, fry, roll in cinnamon sugar.

name: Pesto Pasta
ingredients: pasta, basil, pine nuts, parmesan, olive oil
description: Blend pesto, cook pasta, toss together.

name: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: ground lamb, potatoes, carrots, peas, gravy
description: Cook lamb with veggies, top with mashed potatoes, bake until golden.

name: Baklava
ingredients: phyllo dough, walnuts, honey, butter, cinnamon
description: Layer phyllo with nuts, bake, pour honey syrup over top.

name: Caprese Salad
ingredients: tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, balsamic vinegar
description: Slice tomatoes and cheese, layer with basil, drizzle with balsamic.

name: Pork Dumplings
ingredients: pork, cabbage, wrappers, soy sauce, ginger
description: Mix filling, wrap in dough, steam or pan-fry until cooked.

name: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: chicken, yogurt, tandoori masala, lemon, garlic
description: Marinate chicken in spiced yogurt, grill until charred and juicy.

name: Sourdough Bread
ingredients: flour, water, salt, sourdough starter
description: Mix dough, let rise, shape, bake until crusty.

name: Tuna Salad
ingredients: tuna, mayonnaise, celery, onion, lemon
description: Mix tuna with mayo and veggies, season with lemon.

name: Saag Aloo
ingredients: spinach, potatoes, onion, ginger, cumin
description: Cook potatoes, blend spinach with spices, combine and simmer.

name: Crepes
ingredients: flour, milk, eggs, sugar, butter
description: Mix thin batter, pour into a hot pan, cook until golden, flip.

name: Vegetable Korma
ingredients: mixed vegetables, coconut milk, cashews, curry paste
description: Sauté veggies, simmer in creamy coconut sauce with spices.

name: Hummus
ingredients: chickpeas, tahini, garlic, lemon, olive oil
description: Blend chickpeas with tahini and seasonings until smooth.

name: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: bell peppers, ground beef, rice, tomato sauce, cheese
description: Hollow peppers, stuff with beef and rice, bake with sauce and cheese.
